abstract: The company is developing a television set-top box and is talking with content providers to distribute video services.
snippet: The company is developing a television set-top box and is talking with content providers to distribute video services.
lead_paragraph: SEATTLE — Amazon created the Kindle to breathe life into electronic books. Now it is preparing a device to bring Internet video to television sets.

headline.main: Amazon Plans an Internet Video Device
headline.print_headline: Amazon Plans an Internet Video Device

abstract: Shares rose slightly after the earnings report because the dip in profits was not as great as expected.
snippet: Shares rose slightly after the earnings report because the dip in profits was not as great as expected.
lead_paragraph: SEATTLE — Profits at Amazon are like a tributary that dries up for extended periods of time, while the company diverts them into any number of ambitious new projects intended to ensure a lush future.

headline.main: Amazon’s Profit Falls as It Spends Heavily on Projects
headline.print_headline: Amazon’s Profit Falls as It Spends Heavily on Projects
